menu.desc: For selecting a - points - graph via its gauge-time-series identifier.

points.desc: For illustrating predictions with respect to training and testing data, alongside absolute percentage error per point.  Additional, it records a set of absolute percentage error quantile distributions.

aggregates.desc: The menu and data - catchments.json and aggregates.json, respectively - for illustrating mean or median error metrics per gauge.  Each menu item is a catchment area. The metrics are root mean square error, root median square error, mean percentage error, median percentage error, mean error, median error.
